descrip: I have created an e-commerce web app using React.js and Tailwind CSS, and it's fully optimized, and using browser local storage but The project is well-optimized for desktop experiences but is currently not mobile responsive. For best results, please open it on a desktop device.

I have developed a fully functional Employee Management System using React.js, Tailwind CSS, browser localStorage for storing data. The project is well-optimized for desktop experiences but is currently not mobile responsive. For best results, please open it on a desktop device.
